hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to take a seat.
hs:item.hs:feedback: اِنبَطِح means "Lie down." The root of the verb is بطح

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way السلام عليكمto order someone to maintain an upright position on his feet.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Встаньтe السلام عليكمmeans stand. It is the formal command form of the verb встать.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a السلام عليكمway to tell someone to not go further.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Ждите, السلام عليكمformal command form of ждать, means wait.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to move in your direction.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Подойдите السلام عليكمmeans come here. It is formal command form of the verb подойти.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to move away from you.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Идите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of the verb идти, means go on foot.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to السلام عليكمtell someone not to move.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Oстановитесь السلام عليكمmeans stop. It is the formal command form of the verb oстановиться.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is what you السلام عليكمtell someone when you are offering something.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Возьмите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of взять, means take.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to order السلام عليكمsomeone to yield possession of something.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Дайте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of дать, means give.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to السلام عليكمtell someone to place a thing somewhere.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Положите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of положить, means put down.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to take something by hand.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Поднимите, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of поднимать, means pick up.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to pronounce words.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Говорите, formal السلام عليكمof говорить, means speak.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to ask السلام عليكمsomeone to pay attention to what you are saying.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Слушайте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of слушать, means listen.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to create an opening.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Откройте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of the verb открыть, means open.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is the opposite السلام عليكمof open.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Закройте, formal السلام عليكمcommand form of закрыть, means close.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell السلام عليكمsomeone to light a place.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Включите, formal command السلام عليكمform of включать, means turn on.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell someone السلام عليكمto cut the power.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Выключите, formal command السلام عليكمform of выключать, means turn off.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way to tell someone السلام عليكمto place something in a vehicle.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Грузите, السلام عليكمformal command form of грузить, means load.

hs:item.hs:hint: This is a way السلام عليكمto tell someone to remove something from a vehicle.
hs:item.hs:feedback: Разгрузите, السلام عليكمformal command form of разгрузить, means unload.
